articles.title: Players have discussed WALKING OFF the pitch if fans keep booing taking the knee - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY SAMI MOKBEL AND ADRIAN KAJUMBA: As the fallout from the Den continued, it can be disclosed that clubs are ready to use CCTV footage to root out fans guilty of booing.
articles.content:
Players have discussed walking off the pitch if fans continue to disrespect their fight against racism.
As Sportsmail revealed on Monday, the FA have confirmed they are investigating the disgraceful… [+6310 chars]
